name: Mino (Avesayer)
description:
The game contains a series of puzzle sets in which you have to fill the whole board with tetromino figures in order to solve the puzzle.

Use left click to pick/drop a figure and right click to rotate it.

This project is a replica of the game called Sigils of Elohim and was made only with educational purposes. It was built from scratch using only C++ and SDL2 library.
